column1: It's not love, to be very honest. It's all about hormones. That hype is created, oh my god! It's not love, it's not true love. It's attraction, excitement and love is not like that. If you feel that kind of excitement all the time, that there's always this craziness and anxiety, that's not love. What is love? Love is actually peace. Sokoon? When you are feeling satisfied, when you feel that no matter what I can rely on this person And specially when things go wrong
